verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year שְׁתַּ֔יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Ta-yim, In the second לְיוֹאָ֥שׁ <S%H3101><s%> le-yo-'Ash of Joash בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son יוֹאָחָ֖ז <S%H3099><s%> yo-'a-Chaz of Jehoahaz מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel מָלַ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach reigned אֲמַצְיָ֥הוּ <S%H558><s%> 'a-matz-Ya-hu Amaziah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son יוֹאָ֖שׁ <S%H3101><s%> yo-'Ash of Joash מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim He was twenty וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> ve-cha-Mesh and five שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> ve-ma-le-Cho, when he began to reign וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim twenty וָתֵ֙שַׁע֙ <S%H8672><s%> va-Te-sha' and nine שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach and reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim; in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo, And his mother's; יְהֹועַדִּין ye-ho-'ad-din כיְהֹֽועַדָּ֖ן <S%H3086><s%> ye-ho-'ad-Dan Jehoaddan קמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim. of Jerusalem

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he did הַיָּשָׁר֙ <S%H3477><s%> hai-ya-Shar [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD רַ֕ק <S%H7535><s%> rak yet לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> lo like כְּדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> ke-da-Vid not like David אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv; his father כְּכֹ֧ל <S%H3605><s%> ke-Chol to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- he עָשָׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah he did יוֹאָ֥שׁ <S%H3101><s%> yo-'Ash according to all things as Joash אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv his father עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah. did

רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> rak but הַבָּמ֖וֹת <S%H1116><s%> hab-ba-Mot Howbeit the high places לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- were not סָ֑רוּ <S%H5493><s%> Sa-ru; were not taken away ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od as yet הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am the people מְזַבְּחִ֥ים <S%H2076><s%> me-zab-be-Chim did sacrifice וּֽמְקַטְּרִ֖ים <S%H6999><s%> u-me-kat-te-Rim and burnt incense בַּבָּמֽוֹת׃ <S%H1116><s%> bab-ba-Mot. on the high places

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after חָזְקָ֥ה <S%H2388><s%> cha-ze-Kah was confirmed הַמַּמְלָכָ֖ה <S%H4467><s%> ham-mam-la-Chah And it came to pass as soon as the kingdom בְּיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do; in his hand וַיַּךְ֙ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yaCh that he slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲבָדָ֔יו <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dav, his servants הַמַּכִּ֖ים <S%H5221><s%> ham-mak-Kim which had slain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech the king אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv. his father

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei But the children הַמַּכִּ֖ים <S%H5221><s%> ham-mak-Kim of the murderers לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor הֵמִ֑ית <S%H4191><s%> he-Mit; he slew כַּכָּת֣וּב <S%H3789><s%> kak-ka-Tuv not according unto that which is written בְּסֵ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> be-Se-fer in the book תּֽוֹרַת־ <S%H8451><s%> to-rat- of the law מֹ֠שֶׁה <S%H4872><s%> Mo-sheh of Moses אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after צִוָּ֨ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh wherein the LORD לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor יוּמְת֨וּ <S%H4191><s%> yu-me-Tu shall not be put to death אָב֤וֹת <S%H1><s%> a-Vot The fathers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- for בָּנִים֙ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim for the children וּבָנִים֙ <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nim nor the children לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor יוּמְת֣וּ <S%H4191><s%> yu-me-Tu be put to death עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- for אָב֔וֹת <S%H1><s%> a-Vot, for the fathers כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- but אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish but every man בְּחֶטְא֖וֹ <S%H2399><s%> be-chet-'O for his own sin; יָמוּת ya-mut כיוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat. shall not be put ק

הוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> hu- He הִכָּ֨ה <S%H5221><s%> hik-Kah He slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֱד֤וֹם <S%H123><s%> e-Dom of Edom בְּגֵיא־ <S%H1516><s%> be-gei- in the valley; הַמֶּלַח ham-me-lach כמֶ֙לַח֙ <S%H4417><s%> me-lach salt קעֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> 'a-Se-ret ten אֲלָפִ֔ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim, thousand וְתָפַ֥שׂ <S%H8610><s%> ve-ta-Fas and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַסֶּ֖לַע <S%H5554><s%> has-Se-la' Selah בַּמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> bam-mil-cha-Mah; by war וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמָהּ֙ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mah the name יָקְתְאֵ֔ל <S%H3371><s%> ya-ke-te-'El, of it Joktheel עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. to this פ Peh

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> 'az Then שָׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach sent אֲמַצְיָה֙ <S%H558><s%> 'a-matz-Yah Then Amaziah מַלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim, messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוֹאָ֨שׁ <S%H3060><s%> ye-ho-'Ash to Jehoash בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְהוֹאָחָ֧ז <S%H3059><s%> ye-ho-'a-Chaz of Jehoahaz בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son יֵה֛וּא <S%H3058><s%> ye-Hu of Jehu מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying לְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> le-Chah Come נִתְרָאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> nit-ra-'Eh let us look פָנִֽים׃ <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nim. one another in the face

וַיִּשְׁלַ֞ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent יְהוֹאָ֣שׁ <S%H3060><s%> ye-ho-'Ash And Jehoash מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֲמַצְיָ֣הוּ <S%H558><s%> 'a-matz-Ya-hu to Amaziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king יְהוּדָה֮ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying הַח֜וֹחַ <S%H2336><s%> ha-Cho-ach The thistle אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בַּלְּבָנ֗וֹן <S%H3844><s%> bal-le-va-Non, that [was] in Lebanon שָׁ֠לַח <S%H7971><s%> lach sent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאֶ֜רֶז <S%H730><s%> ha-'E-rez to the cedar אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בַּלְּבָנוֹן֙ <S%H3844><s%> bal-le-va-nOn that [was] in Lebanon לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying תְּנָֽה־ <S%H5414><s%> te-nah- Give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בִּתְּךָ֥ <S%H1323><s%> bit-te-Cha thy daughter לִבְנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Ni to my son לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah; to wife וַֽתַּעֲבֹ֞ר <S%H5674><s%> vat-ta-'a-Vor and there passed חַיַּ֤ת <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yat beast הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh by a wild אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בַּלְּבָנ֔וֹן <S%H3844><s%> bal-le-va-Non, that [was] in Lebanon וַתִּרְמֹ֖ס <S%H7429><s%> vat-tir-Mos and trode down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֽוֹחַ׃ <S%H2336><s%> ha-Cho-ach. the thistle

הַכֵּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> hak-Keh Thou hast indeed הִכִּ֙יתָ֙ <S%H5221><s%> hik-Ki-ta smitten אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> e-Dom, Edom וּֽנְשָׂאֲךָ֖ <S%H5375><s%> u-ne-sa-'a-Cha hath lifted thee up לִבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Be-cha; and thine heart הִכָּבֵד֙ <S%H3513><s%> hik-ka-Ved glory וְשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> ve-Shev [of this] and tarry בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-Te-cha, at home וְלָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> ve-Lam-mah why תִתְגָּרֶה֙ <S%H1624><s%> tit-ga-Reh for why shouldest thou meddle בְּרָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> be-ra-'Ah, to [thy] hurt וְנָ֣פַלְתָּ֔ה <S%H5307><s%> ve-Na-fal-Tah, that thou shouldest fall אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וִיהוּדָ֥ה <S%H3063><s%> vi-hu-Dah [even] thou and Judah עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach. with

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma' would not hear אֲמַצְיָ֔הוּ <S%H558><s%> 'a-matz-Ya-hu, But Amaziah וַיַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al went up יְהוֹאָ֤שׁ <S%H3060><s%> ye-ho-'Ash Therefore Jehoash מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וַיִּתְרָא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> vai-yit-ra-'U looked פָנִ֔ים <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nim, one another in the face ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu and he וַאֲמַצְיָ֣הוּ <S%H558><s%> va-'a-matz-Ya-hu and he and Amaziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah בְּבֵ֥ית be-Veit שֶׁ֖מֶשׁ <S%H1053><s%> She-mesh at Bethshemesh אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לִיהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> li-hu-Dah. which [belongeth] to Judah

וַיִּנָּ֥גֶף <S%H5062><s%> vai-yin-Na-gef was put to the worse יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah And Judah לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; Israel וַיָּנֻ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> vai-ya-Nu-su and they fled אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man; לְאָהֳלֹו le-'o-ho-lov כלְאֹהָלָֽיו׃ <S%H168><s%> le-'o-ha-Lav. tent ק
